text: Cozy cafeteria with good variety of food in the middle of project site; reasonable pricing and taste for cafeteria in project/ construction site

This cafe is aircond and is very spacious. It is catered by Happy Kitchen. The place is very neat and tidy. It has two stalls that cater malay and chinese food. The malay stall, though it's not Halal, but, serve mixed veg rice by a muslim. It has quite a numbers of dishes like sambal fish, chicken drumlets, fried egg , different types of veg, and etc.... The other chinese stall also likewise, the same. In addition, it has also laksa, fried "Hor Fun and bee hoon. The prices are normal. They also sell most of the soft drinks, beside, self boiled barley and tumeric drinks. They also sell snacks like sandwiches and pre-cut fruits like water melon etc.. Nearby, it has a very huge carpark.
Nice cosy place to have your lunch. Ample of parking space. And they, Happy Kitchen, has applied and is now Halal certified
Quality of food and pricing aren't too bad. Worth a try!
